mention.text: medellin mayor juan gomez martinez once more
`` an immediate dialogue '' between the government and the cocaine traffickers
the attack in which 20 persons were killed and approximately 100 were injured , which was perpetrated yesterday by terrorists on the drug cartel 's payroll near itagui municipality
the chief of the criminal gang , pablo escobar gaviria
the `` drug lord '' that had been `` recently '' taken by security organizations at a colombian beach on the pacific coast
security organizations at a colombian beach on the pacific coast
